original_text: I will send you rain in its season, and the ground will yield its crops and the trees their fruit.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 철따라 비를 주리니 땅은 그 산물을 내고 밭의 나무는 열매를 맺으리라

sentences.original_text: I will send you rain in its season
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 때를 따라 너희에게 비를 보내리라

sentences.original_text: and the ground will yield its crops
